class.name: real_panda_control_examples/JointPositionExampleController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on joint positions to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: real_panda_control_examples/ForceExampleController
class.description: A PI controller that applies a force corresponding to a user-provided desired mass in the z axis. The desired mass value can be modified online with dynamic reconfigure.
